body:
**Bug** - The questions asked on [application form](https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/apply) hides as soon as we click on the answer box. It will be much more helpful if the questions stayed visible while we answer them.

**Expected Behaviour**: The questions should stay visible.

**Actual Behaviour**: 
_Before:_
![Before](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11015077/36162940-d2895adc-110d-11e8-9cbc-5bb62d9a8a6b.png)

_After clicking on the answer box:_
![After clicking on the answer box](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11015077/36162941-d2c8f728-110d-11e8-87a1-4f84aa4f900a.png)
